about_the_game:
As a celestial object crashes in the distance the player's character is forced to leave the safety of his village and embark on the perilous journey. By traveling through eight different and unique locations discover the forgotten history of your people and the tragedy that led to the creation of your civilization.
Welcome to the world of Dork!

Dork is platform/adventure game with linear story line spanning through 69 levels spread across 8 locations. Each location features a unique set of hostile creatures and environmental hazards. As the main hero of the story the player will have to collect pieces of the password to unlock the passage to next level and use equipment found along the way to overcome opponents and dangers. Each finished location will reveal another puzzle of the story.

Features:

Story Rich – Uncover the forgotten and emotional story of your civilization.
The Letters – Guess the password by using ancient terminals or collect all letters to open the gates to next level
The Equipment – Use the equipment collected on your way to overcome challenges
Multitude of Foes – Each location has a number of foes unique and specific to the location, learn how to overcome them!
Painted Environment and Characters – Every element of the game was digitally painted by hand.

name: Dork

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 605 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Leave the safety of your village and embark on the journey of adventure! By traveling through eight different and unique locations discover the forgotten history of your people and the tragedy that led to the creation of your civilization. Welcome to the world of Dork!
